title: The incomparable Bob Wachter
itunes:title: The incomparable Bob Wachter
description: Daniel sat down with Bob Wachter to talk about the power of Twitter in public health, the continued evolution of patient-centered digital transformation, the very necessary adjustments to clinical education, his personal history as the founder of the hospitalist movement, and which technologies continue to lag in our industry.
author: CVS Health
itunes:author: CVS Health
